name: TOPENS
0:
”Alexa gate open.”
”Alexa gate close.”
”Alexa set garage light on”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill serves users who have purchased TOPENS gate opener. You need to download the TOPENS app in the app store, register your account and bind the device you purchased, and then bind your account to Alexa, so you can control your TOPENS gate opener through Alexa. See the user guide for details.
